name: Stdout and Stderr capture
description: Demonstrates capturing stdout and stderr and uploading them as output files.

inputs.name: input
inputs.description: Input to command. /tmp/input must exist on the host system.

outputs.name: stdout
outputs.description: Stdout of command is captured and copied to /tmp/stdout on the host system.

outputs.name: stderr
outputs.description: Stderr of command is captured and copied to /tmp/stderr on the host system.
